content:
Ms Phone 
 Ursula Nafula 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She is caled Ms Phone. 
 
 Lok at her! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She has five celphones. 
 
 
 
 When she wakes up, she 
 
 aranges her celphones on 
 
 the table. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The yelow one is for 
 
 comunicating 
 
 with family. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The white one is for 
 
 comunicating with 
 
 people at work. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The red one is for 
 
 comunicating with 
 
 those who owe her 
 
 something. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The pink one is for 
 
 comunicating with 
 
 her best friends. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The purple one is for 
 
 comunicating 
 
 with people who ned her 
 
 help. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ms Phone likes people to 
 
 be hapy. She does not like 
 
 fighting. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She lets the children watch 
 
 television at her shop. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She visits the sick and the 
 
 elderly in their homes. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When she pases, there are 
 
 shouts of “Ms Phone! Ms 
 
 Phone!” 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then she fels hapy and 
 
 says, “I am Ms Phone. 
 
 Here, lok at my phones!” 
 
 
 
 That is Ms Phone and her 
 
 five celphones. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12
